descriptionlist.description: Just another FLEX loader. Why? because we need one more. This one flexes on all other loaders ;D

FLEX (Flipboard Explorer) is a set of debugging and exploration tools for iOS development. When presented, FLEX shows a toolbar that lives in a window above your application. From this toolbar, you can view and modify nearly every piece of state in your running application.
Activation: - Long press on status bar (pre-iOS 13) - Long press anywhere with three finger

Additional Features: - Displayed above Alerts (including SpringBoard alerts) - Prevent sleep on lockscreen when using exploring through the FLEX views - Dismiss explorer window using the done navigation bar instead of having to go all the way to initial view

changelog.change: Update FLEX version (November 11 2019 commit) which has minor code style change (no function or UI changes)
Fix selecting different class in the carousel (inheritance list) not displaying correct results on iOS 13+
